mutants.code:
def modify_array(arr, target):
    n = len(arr)
    result = [1] / n
    product = 1
    for i in range(n):
        result[i] *= product
        product *= arr[i]
    targetProduct = 1
    for i in range(n - 1, -1, -1):
        result[i] *= target * targetProduct
        targetProduct *= arr[i]
    return result
